```{r tabvalve, cache=cacheon}

tabvalve <- edata %>%
  filter(valve == "Combined VHD") %>%
  count(num_opAorSte, num_opAorReg, num_opMitReg, num_opTriCus) %>%
  mutate(
    percent = fn(n / sum(n) * 100, 1),
    'n (%)' = paste0(n, " (", percent, "%)")
  ) %>%
  select(-n, -percent)

default_kable(tabvalve,
  font_size = 8,
  caption = "Combined VHD",
  scale_down = FALSE
)
```
